Day 2 of Alaskan Cruise- Cruising Queen Charlotte Islands

Our Route
Between Seattle and Juneau
Cruising along

Johnnie relaxing and looking
Gazing at beautiful scenery
Obie is relaxing also

Happy as a lark!
Look at those clouds!
Imagine swimming while in Alaska (but on an inside deck on ship)!
